Reviews.Title: Peek-A-Boo
Reviews.Author: eslowmotion
Reviews.Content: This Surveillance system is by far one of the best items in security i has ever purchased,no more running to the door to answer it,the install was kinda easy for the do it your selfers,i love it and would recommend it to any home owner.

Reviews.Title: church use
Reviews.Author: Raymeril
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to be used for our church building where the kids stay during the service, parents can be buzzed in and viewed thru the monitor.  Works great and was exactly what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: I have crippling arthritis and it was hard for me to get to my door before the people left..so I purchased this surveillance system..It works really good..When people ring the doorbell or knock, I can view them without them knowing..Then, if alright, I can push the talk button and talk with them and they can answer me..I feel safer and more independent..It was just what I needed..I give it 5 stars..Margie Morrow

ProductInfo.Features:

Works with your existing doorbell wiring so setup is fast and hassle-free
Safely identify visitors with video and audio before deciding to answer the door
Enjoy the convenience of hands free operation; Night vision camera gives you around the clock protection
Door strike compatibility allows you to remotely unlock your door; Wiring distance of 164'; 7" LCD screen
